description: This file defines the NotesService class which provides CRUD operations and search capabilities for notes stored in a database via Supabase.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: Provides CRUD operations for notes including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes using Supabase.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes, with optional case-insensitive search filtering on title and content, ordered by update time descending.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with the specified title and content, setting timestamps.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID with new title and content, updating the timestamp.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.
